1.0.1.name: wordpress/private-category
1.0.1.description:
Make a private category (with login-logout) A login will then appear on the selected category page . Put in this category all posts that should be private not forget to change the status to private. Users must identify themselves to gain access to content

Options: active/desactive privacy || choose category || subscriber can/cant read private posts&pages

devsector.ch
